ai.summary: A short, easy 2.1 km hike around Carn Brea in the UK. The route is family-friendly with well-marked paths and gentle gradients, offering pleasant views with minimal effort.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly compact dirt and gravel paths with occasional grassy sections and a few uneven stones. Some steps near historic features, but overall easy for beginners.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather and daylight before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and bring water. Stay on marked paths, be mindful of uneven surfaces, and watch for low-hanging branches or edges near viewpoints. Keep children close and let others pass on narrow sections.
